entry.title: Photos Post 29: Special Events (after 1975), Part 74
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 43 Photos of the special event 1988-1225 Christmas Pūjā, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 10 high resolutions and 43 medium resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 47 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: India 1988.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
